DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this randomized cross-over study was to determine the effects of legume consumption on adiponectin and inflammatory factors among first degree relatives of diabetic patients
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Legume Consumption on Adiponectin and Inflammatory Markers Among Adults
DOC.criteria: age more than 30 years no history of chronic diseases no use of blood glucose lowering drugs do not use recommended amounts of legumes incidence of chronic diseases during the study to start use of blood glucose lowering drugs
